message_1: Suppose a message "HELLO WORLD" is encrypted using a Rail Fence Cipher with a rail height of 3. The encrypted message comes out to be "HORL WLEL ODL". Can you decrypt this message to find the original message?
message_2:
Yes, I can decrypt the message using the Rail Fence Cipher with a rail height of 3.

The encrypted message is "HORL WLEL ODL". To decrypt it, we will arrange the characters in a zigzag pattern with 3 rows:

H . . . O . . . R . . . L
. W . L . E . L . O . D
. . . L . . . W . . . .

Now, read the characters in the zigzag pattern from left to right and top to bottom:

H -> E -> L -> L -> O -> W -> O -> R -> L -> D -> L

The decrypted message is "HELLO WORLD".
